title: TIL: Versions of UUID and when to use them
dot:
digraph UUID_Versions{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontcolor=black, fontsize=10];main[label="Main Idea: Uses for Different UUID Versions" shape=ellipse]; subgraph cluster_versions{label="UUID Versions";style=dashed; v1[label="v1: Timestamp + Counter + MAC"];v2[label="v2: Security IDs
(unspecified details)"];v3[label="v3: MD5 Hash
(data)"];v4[label="v4: Random Data"];v5[label="v5: SHA1 Hash
(data)"];v6[label="v6: Timestamp + Counter + MAC
(Sorted by Creation Time)"];v7[label="v7: Timestamp + Random Data"];v8[label="v8: Custom Data"];}subgraph cluster_usage{label="When to Use";style=dotted;default_choice[label="Default: Use v4 for Random ID"];sorting_choice[label="Use v7 for Sortable IDs"];custom_data[label="Use v5 or v8 for Custom Data"]; unused_v1_v6[label="Avoid v1, v6 (use v7)
v2: Reserved for Security
v3: Superseded by v5"];}main->cluster_versions;main->cluster_usage;cluster_usage->default_choice;cluster_usage->sorting_choice;cluster_usage->custom_data;cluster_usage->unused_v1_v6;}
